credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Mourning scene
medium: Pen and gray ink, brush and gray wash
description: Horizontal rectangle. A woman and two children stand at left at a cinerary urn, in mourning attitude. At right sits a river god. A frigate is in the background. Broad framing stripe. The signature is below its left corner: "Barberi Architetto invento e disegno".
name: Drawing
